root.cn: 这是专为儿童精心设计的拼图游戏，内含上百道关卡，有生活中大部分常见的物体，涵盖动物，水果，蔬菜，花卉，交通工具等方面。宝宝通过玩该游戏可以提高对生活中事物的认知能力以及促进您孩子大脑的形象思维能力！眼，手，脑也一起得到锻炼，培养宝宝的综合能力，宝宝们赶快来体验吧！
root.en: This is a specially designed jigsaw puzzle for children. It contains hundreds of passes and most of the common objects in life, including animals, fruits, vegetables, flowers, and transportation. By playing this game, your baby can improve your cognitive ability in life and promote your child's image thinking ability. The eye, hands and brain are also trained together to cultivate the comprehensive ability of the baby.
